content.text:
# List of orchestration software

This is a list of different orchestration software.
List
* ADARA Networks
* Ansible
* BMC Software
* CFEngine
* Cloud-init
* Cloudify
* CloudVelox
* Conductor
* DynamicOps
* FOG Project
* Kubernetes
* ManageIQ
* OpenSAF
* OpenTofu
* Progress Chef
* Puppet
* Rex
* Salt
* Serf
* StackStorm
* Terraform
* TotalAgility
* Veeam Availability Orchestrator
See also
* Continuous configuration automation
* Infrastructure as code
